Alert.Name: DELETE_ALERT
Alert.AlertMessage:
Are you sure you want to remove this customer?
(Note: changes do not become final until you Save them.)

Alert.Name: CONFIRM_REVERT
Alert.Title: Payment Type
Alert.AlertMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel the changes you have made?

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- This code will expand the current node in a tree.

DECLARE
 htree ITEM;
 node FTree.NODE;
BEGIN
 -- Find the tree itself.
 htree := Find_Item('Navigator.tree_cust');
 
 -- Expand the current node.
 node := :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE;
 Ftree.Set_Tree_Node_Property(htree, node, Ftree.NODE_STATE, Ftree.EXPANDED_NODE);
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- This code will collapse the current node in a tree.

DECLARE
 htree ITEM;
 node FTree.NODE;
BEGIN
 -- Find the tree itself.
 htree := Find_Item('Navigator.tree_cust');
 
 -- Collapse the current node.
 node := :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE;
 Ftree.Set_Tree_Node_Property(htree, node, Ftree.NODE_STATE, Ftree.COLLAPSED_NODE);
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 v_count number;
 v_node ftree.node;
begin
 v_count := ftree.get_tree_property('Navigator.tree_cust',
 ftree.selection_count);

 if v_count < 1 then
 message('no_selection');
 elsif v_count > 1 then
 message('too_many_selection');
 end if;
 
 if v_count = 1 then
 v_node := ftree.get_tree_selection('Navigator.tree_cust', 1);
 expand_all(v_node);
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 v_count number;
 v_node ftree.node;
begin
 v_count := ftree.get_tree_property('Navigator.tree_cust',
 ftree.selection_count);

 if v_count < 1 then
 message('no_selection');
 elsif v_count > 1 then
 message('too_many_selection');
 end if;
 
 if v_count = 1 then
 v_node := ftree.get_tree_selection('Navigator.tree_cust', 1);
 collapse_all(v_node);
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-TREE-NODE-ACTIVATED
Trigger.TriggerText:
:GLOBAL.customer_id := :S_CUSTOMER.id;
IF ID_NULL(FIND_FORM('ORDERS')) THEN
-- CALL_FORM('ORDERS',hide, do_replace, SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA);
OPEN_FORM('ORDERS');
ELSE
 GO_FORM('ORDERS');
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-TREE-NODE-SELECTED
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- This code could be used in a WHEN-TREE-NODE-SELECTED
 -- trigger to return the value of the node that was
 -- clicked on.

DECLARE
 htree ITEM;
 node_value VARCHAR2(100);
 node_label VARCHAR2(100);
 node_depth VARCHAR2(100);
 cust_id VARCHAR2(100);
BEGIN
-- hide_view('cust_stacked');
-- hide_view('cust_tab');
 
 -- Find the tree itself.
 htree := Find_Item('Navigator.tree_cust'); 
 -- Find the value of the node clicked on.
 node_value := Ftree.Get_Tree_Node_Property(htree, :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE, Ftree.NODE_VALUE);
 node_label := Ftree.Get_Tree_Node_Property(htree, :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE, Ftree.NODE_LABEL);
 node_depth := Ftree.Get_Tree_Node_Property(htree, :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE, Ftree.NODE_DEPTH);

 if node_depth = 1 then
 go_block('Navigator'); 
 elsif node_depth = 3 then
 -- Modify the Where Clause in the S_ORD1 Block.
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('s_customer1', DEFAULT_WHERE, 'id = ' || node_value);
 go_block('s_customer1');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 elsif node_depth = 2 then
 cust_id := '( ';
 if :NavigationControls.view = 1 then
 for i in ( select id from s_customer where country = ltrim(rtrim(node_label)))
 loop
 cust_id := cust_id || i.id || ', ';
 end loop;
 else
 for i in ( select id from s_customer where sales_rep_id = node_value)
 loop
 cust_id := cust_id || i.id || ', ';
 end loop;

 end if; 
 cust_id := substr(cust_id,1 , length(cust_id)-2) || ')';
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('s_customer1', DEFAULT_WHERE, 'id in ' || cust_id);
 go_block('s_customer1');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: COLLAPSE_ALL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE collapse_all (p_node in ftree.node) IS
 next_node ftree.node;
BEGIN
 ftree.set_tree_node_property('Navigator.tree_cust',
 p_node,
 ftree.node_state,
 ftree.collapsed_node);

 next_node := ftree.find_tree_node('Navigator.tree_cust',
 '',
 ftree.find_next,
 ftree.node_value,
 p_node,
 p_node);
 while not ftree.id_null(next_node) loop
 ftree.set_tree_node_property('Navigator.tree_cust',
 next_node,
 ftree.node_state,
 ftree.collapsed_node);
 next_node := ftree.find_tree_node('Navigator.tree_cust',
 '',
 ftree.find_next,
 ftree.node_value,
 p_node,
 next_node);
 end loop;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN null;
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: EXPAND_ALL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE expand_all (p_node in ftree.node) IS
 next_node ftree.node;
BEGIN
 ftree.set_tree_node_property('Navigator.tree_cust',
 p_node,
 ftree.node_state,
 ftree.expanded_node);

 next_node := ftree.find_tree_node('Navigator.tree_cust',
 '',
 ftree.find_next,
 ftree.node_value,
 p_node,
 p_node);
 while not ftree.id_null(next_node) loop
 ftree.set_tree_node_property('Navigator.tree_cust',
 next_node,
 ftree.node_state,
 ftree.expanded_node);
 next_node := ftree.find_tree_node('Navigator.tree_cust',
 '',
 ftree.find_next,
 ftree.node_value,
 p_node,
 next_node);
 end loop;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: REFRESH_TREE_COUNTRY
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE refresh_tree_country IS
 cursor cursor_country is
 select distinct country, 1 Val
 from s_customer
 order by country;
 cursor cursor_cust(p_country varchar2) is
 select name, id
 from s_customer
 where country = p_country
 order by name;

 v_i number := 1;
 v_ignore number;

 rg_custs recordgroup;
 rg_countrys recordgroup;

 v_init_state groupcolumn;
 v_level groupcolumn;
 v_label groupcolumn;
 v_icon groupcolumn;
 v_value groupcolumn;
begin
 rg_countrys := find_group('COUNTRYS');
 if not id_null(rg_countrys) then
 delete_group(rg_countrys);
 end if;
 
 rg_countrys := create_group('COUNTRYS');
 
 v_init_state := add_group_column(rg_countrys, 'init_state', number_column); 
 v_level := add_group_column(rg_countrys, 'level', number_column);
 v_label := add_group_column(rg_countrys, 'label', char_column, 40);
 v_icon := add_group_column(rg_countrys, 'icon', char_column, 20);
 v_value := add_group_column(rg_countrys, 'value', char_column, 5);
 
 add_group_row(rg_countrys, v_i);
 set_group_number_cell(v_init_state, v_i, 1);
 set_group_number_cell(v_level , v_i, 1);
 set_group_char_cell (v_label , v_i, 'Customer List By Country');
-- set_group_char_cell (v_icon , v_i, 'homesmall');
 set_group_char_cell (v_value , v_i, to_char(0));
 
 v_i := v_i + 1;
 for countryrec in cursor_country loop
 add_group_row(rg_countrys, v_i);
 set_group_number_cell(v_init_state, v_i, 1);
 set_group_number_cell(v_level , v_i, 2);
 set_group_char_cell (v_label , v_i, ' ' || countryrec.country);
-- set_group_char_cell (v_icon , v_i, 'country');
 set_group_char_cell (v_value , v_i, to_char(countryrec.val));
 v_i := v_i + 1;

 for custrec in cursor_cust(countryrec.country) loop
 add_group_row(rg_countrys, v_i);
 set_group_number_cell(v_init_state, v_i, 1);
 set_group_number_cell(v_level , v_i, 3);
 set_group_char_cell (v_label , v_i, ' ' || custrec.name);
 set_group_char_cell (v_icon , v_i, NULL);
 set_group_char_cell (v_value , v_i, to_char(custrec.id));
 v_i := v_i + 1;
 end loop;
 end loop; 
 ftree.set_tree_property('Navigator.tree_cust', ftree.record_group, rg_countrys);
 go_item('Navigator.tree_cust');
end;

ProgramUnit.Name: REFRESH_TREE_SALESREP
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE refresh_tree_salesrep IS
 cursor cursor_sales is
 select last_name || ' ' || first_name Name, id
 from s_emp
 where title like 'Sales%'
 order by title;
 cursor cursor_cust(p_id number) is
 select name, id
 from s_customer
 where sales_rep_id = p_id
 order by name;

 v_i number := 1;
 
 rg_custs recordgroup;

 v_init_state groupcolumn;
 v_level groupcolumn;
 v_label groupcolumn;
 v_icon groupcolumn;
 v_value groupcolumn;
begin
 rg_custs := find_group('CUSTS');
 if not id_null(rg_custs) then
 delete_group(rg_custs);
 end if;
 
 rg_custs := create_group('CUSTS');
 
 v_init_state := add_group_column(rg_custs, 'init_state', number_column); 
 v_level := add_group_column(rg_custs, 'level', number_column);
 v_label := add_group_column(rg_custs, 'label', char_column, 40);
 v_icon := add_group_column(rg_custs, 'icon', char_column, 20);
 v_value := add_group_column(rg_custs, 'value', char_column, 5);
 
 add_group_row(rg_custs, v_i);
 set_group_number_cell(v_init_state, v_i, 1);
 set_group_number_cell(v_level , v_i, 1);
 set_group_char_cell (v_label , v_i, 'Customer List By Sales Rep');
-- set_group_char_cell (v_icon , v_i, 'homesmall');
 set_group_char_cell (v_value , v_i, to_char(0));
 
 v_i := v_i + 1;
 for salesrec in cursor_sales loop
 add_group_row(rg_custs, v_i);
 set_group_number_cell(v_init_state, v_i, 1);
 set_group_number_cell(v_level , v_i, 2);
 set_group_char_cell (v_label , v_i, ' ' || salesrec.name);
-- set_group_char_cell (v_icon , v_i, 'country');
 set_group_char_cell (v_value , v_i, to_char(salesrec.id));
 v_i := v_i + 1;

 for custrec in cursor_cust(salesrec.id) loop
 add_group_row(rg_custs, v_i);
 set_group_number_cell(v_init_state, v_i, 1);
 set_group_number_cell(v_level , v_i, 3);
 set_group_char_cell (v_label , v_i, ' ' || custrec.name);
 set_group_char_cell (v_icon , v_i, NULL);
 set_group_char_cell (v_value , v_i, to_char(custrec.id));
 v_i := v_i + 1;
 end loop;
 end loop; 
 ftree.set_tree_property('Navigator.tree_cust', ftree.record_group, rg_custs);
 go_item('Navigator.tree_cust');
end;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_PACKAGE_FAILURE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
Procedure Check_Package_Failure IS
BEGIN
 IF NOT ( Form_Success ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: QUERY_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Query_Master_Details(rel_id Relation,detail VARCHAR2) IS
 oldmsg VARCHAR2(2); -- Old Message Level Setting
 reldef VARCHAR2(5); -- Relation Deferred Setting
BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Variable(s)
 --
 reldef := Get_Relation_Property(rel_id, DEFERRED_COORDINATION);
 oldmsg := :System.Message_Level;
 --
 -- If NOT Deferred, Goto detail and execute the query.
 --
 IF reldef = 'FALSE' THEN
 Go_Block(detail);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 :System.Message_Level := '10';
 Execute_Query;
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Relation is deferred, mark the detail block as un-coordinated
 --
 Set_Block_Property(detail, COORDINATION_STATUS, NON_COORDINATED);
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 RAISE;
END Query_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: CLEAR_ALL_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Clear_All_Master_Details IS
 mastblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Initial Master Block Causing Coord
 coordop VARCHAR2(30); -- Operation Causing the Coord
 trigblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Cur Block On-Clear-Details Fires On
 startitm VARCHAR2(61); -- Item in which cursor started
 frmstat VARCHAR2(15); -- Form Status
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 curdtl VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Detail Block

 FUNCTION First_Changed_Block_Below(Master VARCHAR2)
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 retblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Return Block
 BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Vars
 --
 curblk := Master;
 currel := Get_Block_Property(curblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 --
 -- While there exists another relation for this block
 --
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 --
 -- Get the name of the detail block
 --
 curblk := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 --
 -- If this block has changes, return its name
 --
 IF ( Get_Block_Property(curblk, STATUS) = 'CHANGED' ) THEN
 RETURN curblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- No changes, recursively look for changed blocks below
 --
 retblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(curblk);
 --
 -- If some block below is changed, return its name
 --
 IF retblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 RETURN retblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Consider the next relation
 --
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- No changed blocks were found
 --
 RETURN NULL;
 END First_Changed_Block_Below;

BEGIN
 --
 -- Init Local Vars
 --
 mastblk := :System.Master_Block;
 coordop := :System.Coordination_Operation;
 trigblk := :System.Trigger_Block;
 startitm := :System.Cursor_Item;
 frmstat := :System.Form_Status;

 --
 -- If the coordination operation is anything but CLEAR_RECORD or
 -- SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS, then continue checking.
 --
 IF coordop NOT IN ('CLEAR_RECORD', 'SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS') THEN
 --
 -- If we're processing the driving master block...
 --
 IF mastblk = trigblk THEN
 --
 -- If something in the form is changed, find the
 -- first changed block below the master
 --
 IF frmstat = 'CHANGED' THEN
 curblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(mastblk);
 --
 -- If we find a changed block below, go there
 -- and Ask to commit the changes.
 --
 IF curblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 Go_Block(curblk);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(ASK_COMMIT);
 --
 -- If user cancels commit dialog, raise error
 --
 IF NOT ( :System.Form_Status = 'QUERY'
 OR :System.Block_Status = 'NEW' ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 --
 -- Clear all the detail blocks for this master without
 -- any further asking to commit.
 --
 currel := Get_Block_Property(trigblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 curdtl := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 IF Get_Block_Property(curdtl, STATUS) <> 'NEW' THEN
 Go_Block(curdtl);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(NO_VALIDATE);
 IF :System.Block_Status <> 'NEW' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- Put cursor back where it started
 --
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 END IF;
 RAISE;

END Clear_All_Master_Details;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
Set_Application_Property(MENU_BUFFERING, 'false');
set_window_property(forms_mdi_window, window_state, maximize);
set_window_property(forms_mdi_window, title, 'Summit Application');

-- Open the query
refresh_tree_country;
go_block('Navigator');
:NavigationControls.view := 1;

Trigger.Name: ON-CLEAR-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 Clear_All_Master_Details;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--
